name: HillUp Oil Tanker Fuel Transpo
description:
HillUp Oil Tanker Fuel Transport 18 is to transport refined oil, high flammable gasoline safely to the hill gas station. transport fuel tanker to the army base and avoid heavy traffic vehicles on the mountain roads. Driving an oil cargo tanker in these areas are very difficult and life risking task as Oil or super gasoline needs only one spark to blow up the whole cargo truck. Don't over these heavy wood cargo truck like off road Xcar racing be careful with oil truck because there is a more chances truck accident on the road.

• Experience of driving Uphill Oil and Fuel Transport
• Enjoy Realistic mountain environment
• Environment of Steep Hills and City Traffic
• latest and fast concept of Oil Transportation
• Best Driving Simulation Game
